created_at.description: RFC 3339 datetime string representing when the file was created.

downloadable.description: Whether the file can be downloaded.

filename.description: Original filename of the uploaded file.

id.description: Unique object identifier. The format and length of IDs may change over time.

size_bytes.description: Size of the file in bytes.

type.description: Object type. For files, this is always 'file'.
